func.brief: Returns the name of the currently executing "message" method.

ret.desc: The method name as a string.

func.body: The current method name refers to the method invoked by the last incoming EVENT or QUERY message. If the HyperScript program was self-started, without a message, then the method name is always "_main_". Calling a method in a HyperScript program statement does not affect or change the current method name.
